titleStmt.title: A ballad reioycinge the sodaine fall, of rebels that thought to deuower vs all

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestreete, by William How, for Henry Kirkham, and are to be solde at his shop at the middle north doore of Paules Churche,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Reioyce with me ye Christians all,".
Identified as STC 1326a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the middle north doore of Paules Churche
